name: Tower Of Idols
description:
I return for my 8th LD jam!

This time with my first solo 3D project, I’m not really sure what happened this time around as the main gameplay loop changed about 4 times throughout the jam.

Overall I’m really happy with the result and I hope you enjoy playing it!

Tower of Idols is a physics puzzle game where you play as a god trying to save his followers
